DOC.brief_title: The Norwegian Physical Therapy Study Preterm Infants

The reported incidence mild developmental abnormality 15-20 % child gestational age < 28 week birth weight 1000 g , 10-20 % child gestational age 28-31 week birth weight 1000-1500 g 5 % child born term . The incidence cerebral palsy 10-20 % amongst child first group , 5-10 % second group 0,1 % child bear term.With high risk develop motor abnormality infant born preterm together limited evidence-based knowledge early physiotherapy approach facilitate motor development , essential research do area ensure physiotherapy use , right manner prevent reduce difficulty .
